snippet: With the opening of Barclays Center in Brooklyn, it was easy to wonder what might have been had a plan to build a stadium for the Dodgers across the street from the Nets’ new arena not been scuttled 55 years ago.
abstract: With the opening of Barclays Center in Brooklyn, it was easy to wonder what might have been had a plan to build a stadium for the Dodgers across the street from the Nets’ new arena not been scuttled 55 years ago.

headline.main: Nets' Opener in Brooklyn Has Shades of Old and New
